meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> and a couple <radical>fire</radical>s run into each other. They cancel each other out completely, and the remainder left behind is a <kanji>faint</kanji> remnant of what was once there.
readingMnemonic: Just like the tsunami and fire canceling each other out, leaving a <kanji>faint</kanji> remainder of what was, your <reading>tan</reading> (たん) is extremely faint as well.
